welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bergamo, Italy! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's medieval charm, rich history, and stunning architecture. Enjoy your time exploring and experiencing all that Bergamo has to offer. Buon viaggio!

restaurants.name: Tresoldi
restaurants.description: Tresoldi is a bakery located in Bergamo.

restaurants.name: Taverna Valtellinese
restaurants.description: Taverna Valtellinese is a italian restaurant located in Bergamo.

restaurants.name: Trattoria da Adriano
restaurants.description: Trattoria da Adriano is a trattoria located in Bergamo.

restaurants.description: Kura is a sushi restaurant located in Bergamo.

restaurants.name: Miyabi

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Bergamo - Orio al Serio Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used primarily for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linate Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Linate Airport, primarily used for charter and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Network name and password can be found on signs throughout the terminal.
